topics.question: Many believe that the traditional educational system of teachers and students in a classroom will be replaced by 2050. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this view?

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài yêu cầu bạn đưa ra quan điểm về việc hệ thống giáo dục truyền thống (thầy-trò trong lớp học) có bị thay thế hoàn toàn vào năm 2050 hay không. Đây là dạng Agree/Disagree - bạn cần chọn một lập trường rõ ràng (đồng ý hoàn toàn, không đồng ý hoàn toàn, hoặc đồng ý một phần). Từ khóa quan trọng: 'replaced' (thay thế hoàn toàn), 'by 2050' (mốc thời gian cụ thể), 'traditional' (truyền thống). Lưu ý: không nên viết về ưu/nhược điểm của online learning mà phải tập trung vào việc liệu giáo dục truyền thống có bị THAY THẾ HOÀN TOÀN hay không.
keyPoints: Xác định rõ lập trường: đồng ý hay không đồng ý
Từ 'replaced' nghĩa là thay thế hoàn toàn, không phải bổ sung
Cần có ví dụ cụ thể về công nghệ giáo dục
Đề cập đến những hạn chế của việc học online

vocabulary.meaning: trường học truyền thống (có cơ sở vật chất)
vocabulary.example: Brick-and-mortar schools provide essential social interaction.
Virtual learning environments have become increasingly sophisticated.
Traditional pedagogical approaches emphasize face-to-face instruction.

vocabulary.meaning: thế hệ sinh ra trong thời đại số
vocabulary.example: Digital natives are comfortable with technology-based learning.
Hands-on learning cannot be fully replicated online.
The educational paradigm is shifting towards blended learning.
Schools help develop crucial interpersonal skills.
Traditional education supports holistic development of students.

academicPhrases: While technology has revolutionized many aspects of education, I firmly believe that...
It is undeniable that digital learning offers numerous advantages; however...
The notion that traditional classrooms will become obsolete seems overly simplistic because...
Despite the rapid advancement of educational technology...
A more realistic scenario would be a hybrid model where...
The irreplaceable value of human interaction in education lies in...

sampleAnswer.introduction: The rapid advancement of technology has sparked debates about the future of education. While some predict that traditional classroom settings will become obsolete by 2050, I partially disagree with this view, believing that a hybrid model will emerge instead.
sampleAnswer.body1: Admittedly, technology is transforming education at an unprecedented pace. Virtual learning environments now offer interactive lessons, AI-powered tutoring, and personalized learning paths that can adapt to individual student needs. For instance, platforms like Coursera and Khan Academy have demonstrated that high-quality education can be delivered remotely. Furthermore, the COVID-19 pandemic accelerated the adoption of online learning, proving that education can continue without physical classrooms.
sampleAnswer.body2: However, I believe traditional education possesses irreplaceable qualities that technology cannot fully replicate. First, schools serve as crucial spaces for socialization where children develop interpersonal skills, emotional intelligence, and learn to collaborate with peers. Second, hands-on subjects such as laboratory sciences, arts, and physical education require physical presence and direct supervision. Third, many students, particularly younger ones, lack the self-discipline required for independent online learning and benefit from the structured environment that classrooms provide.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In conclusion, while educational technology will undoubtedly play an increasingly prominent role, I believe traditional classrooms will not be entirely replaced by 2050. Instead, a blended approach combining the best of both worlds will likely become the new standard in education.

topics.question: Some people think that modern communication technology is having a negative effect on social relationships. To what extent do you agree or disagree with this?

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài hỏi về tác động TIÊU CỰC của công nghệ giao tiếp hiện đại (điện thoại, mạng xã hội, tin nhắn...) đến các mối quan hệ xã hội. Đây là dạng Agree/Disagree. Bạn có thể: (1) Đồng ý hoàn toàn - công nghệ làm hại các mối quan hệ, (2) Không đồng ý - công nghệ giúp ích cho các mối quan hệ, (3) Đồng ý một phần - có cả mặt tốt và xấu. Từ khóa: 'modern communication technology' (không chỉ smartphone), 'social relationships' (quan hệ gia đình, bạn bè, đồng nghiệp...).
keyPoints: Định nghĩa rõ 'modern communication technology'
Phân tích cả quan hệ gia đình lẫn bạn bè
Đưa ví dụ cụ thể về cách công nghệ ảnh hưởng đến giao tiếp
Cân nhắc cả tác động tích cực nếu chọn partially agree

vocabulary.example: Face-to-face interaction is declining among young people.
Social media often leads to superficial connections rather than deep friendships.
Digital communication lacks the warmth of personal contact.
Excessive phone use can lead to social isolation.
Instant messaging has replaced phone calls for many people.
Virtual relationships may not provide genuine emotional support.

vocabulary.meaning: thời gian sử dụng màn hình
vocabulary.example: Excessive screen time reduces quality family time.
Technology helps maintain long-distance relationships effectively.

academicPhrases: There is growing concern that technology is eroding the quality of human connections...
While digital platforms enable constant connectivity, they may paradoxically...
The proliferation of smartphones has fundamentally altered how people interact...
It is increasingly evident that virtual communication cannot substitute for...
The quality of relationships depends not on the medium of communication but on...
Technology serves as a double-edged sword in terms of social relationships...

sampleAnswer.introduction: In the digital age, communication technology has become deeply integrated into our daily lives. While some argue that these technologies harm social relationships, I partially agree with this view, believing that the impact depends largely on how technology is used.
sampleAnswer.body1: On one hand, there is compelling evidence that technology negatively affects relationships. Firstly, excessive smartphone use during family gatherings or social events has become commonplace, reducing meaningful face-to-face interaction. Studies show that the mere presence of a phone on a table diminishes the quality of conversation. Additionally, social media often creates superficial connections where people accumulate hundreds of 'friends' yet lack genuine emotional support. The constant comparison with others' curated online lives can also breed jealousy and dissatisfaction in real relationships.
sampleAnswer.body2: On the other hand, communication technology has undeniably strengthened certain relationships. Video calling platforms like Zoom and FaceTime allow families separated by distance to maintain close bonds. For instance, grandparents can now watch their grandchildren grow up despite living in different countries. Moreover, messaging apps enable people to stay connected throughout the day, sharing moments and providing emotional support instantly. Online communities also help individuals with shared interests or challenges find support networks they might never access otherwise.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In conclusion, while technology can damage relationships when misused, it also offers powerful tools for connection. The key lies in using technology mindfully to enhance rather than replace genuine human interaction.

topics.question: Some people think keeping health is a basic need of humans, thus medical care should not be run by profit-making companies. Do the disadvantages of private health care outweigh the advantages?

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài yêu cầu so sánh ưu và nhược điểm của y tế tư nhân, rồi đưa ra kết luận cái nào nhiều hơn. Lưu ý: đề có gợi ý rằng sức khỏe là nhu cầu cơ bản nên không nên vì lợi nhuận, nhưng bạn vẫn có thể đồng ý hoặc không. Dạng bài: Outweigh - bạn phải phân tích CẢ HAI mặt và đưa ra quan điểm rõ ràng xem nhược điểm có lớn hơn ưu điểm không. Từ khóa: 'profit-making companies' (công ty vì lợi nhuận), 'basic need' (nhu cầu cơ bản).
keyPoints: Phân tích cả advantages và disadvantages
Kết luận rõ ràng: outweigh hay không
Đề cập đến equality in healthcare access
So sánh với hệ thống y tế công

vocabulary.meaning: chăm sóc y tế toàn dân
vocabulary.example: Universal healthcare ensures everyone has access to medical services.
Profit-driven healthcare may prioritize revenue over patient welfare.
Private hospitals often have higher medical expenses.
Private hospitals often provide superior quality of care.
Private healthcare can exacerbate healthcare inequality.
Private hospitals typically have shorter waiting times.
Competition drives medical innovation in the private sector.

vocabulary.meaning: điều trị với giá cả phải chăng
vocabulary.example: Public hospitals offer more affordable treatment options.

academicPhrases: Healthcare is fundamentally different from other services because...
The commercialization of healthcare raises serious ethical concerns...
While private healthcare offers certain benefits, these are outweighed by...
The profit motive in healthcare can lead to...
A two-tier healthcare system inevitably creates...
The primary obligation of medical institutions should be...

sampleAnswer.introduction: The debate over whether healthcare should be operated by private, profit-making companies continues to divide opinion. While private healthcare offers certain advantages, I believe its disadvantages ultimately outweigh the benefits, particularly regarding accessibility and equity.
sampleAnswer.body1: Private healthcare does offer notable advantages. Firstly, private hospitals typically provide shorter waiting times and more personalized attention due to higher staff-to-patient ratios. Secondly, the competitive nature of private healthcare drives medical innovation, as companies invest in cutting-edge technology and treatments to attract patients. Additionally, private facilities often offer more comfortable environments with modern amenities, improving the overall patient experience.
sampleAnswer.body2: However, the disadvantages of private healthcare are more significant. Most critically, profit-driven healthcare creates a two-tier system where quality medical care becomes a privilege of the wealthy rather than a basic human right. Those who cannot afford private insurance or out-of-pocket expenses are left with limited options. Furthermore, the profit motive may lead to unnecessary treatments and procedures, as hospitals seek to maximize revenue. There is also the concern that private healthcare drains skilled medical professionals from the public sector, further weakening services for the majority.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In conclusion, although private healthcare offers efficiency and innovation, these benefits cannot justify the fundamental inequality it creates. Healthcare, as a basic human need, should prioritize accessibility over profit, suggesting that the disadvantages of private healthcare do outweigh its advantages.

topics.question: Some people say free-time activities for children should be organized by parents. Others say that children should be free to choose what they do in their free time. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài yêu cầu thảo luận HAI quan điểm: (1) Cha mẹ nên tổ chức hoạt động ngoại khóa cho con, (2) Trẻ em nên tự chọn hoạt động. Đây là dạng Discuss Both Views - bạn PHẢI trình bày cả hai quan điểm một cách cân bằng, sau đó đưa ra ý kiến cá nhân. Từ khóa: 'free-time activities' (hoạt động ngoài giờ học), 'organized by parents' (cha mẹ sắp xếp), 'free to choose' (tự do lựa chọn).
keyPoints: Trình bày lý do cha mẹ nên tổ chức
Trình bày lý do trẻ nên tự chọn
Đưa ra quan điểm cá nhân rõ ràng
Có thể đề xuất giải pháp cân bằng

vocabulary.example: Structured activities help children develop discipline.
Unstructured play fosters creativity and imagination.
Parents often enroll children in numerous extracurricular activities.
Children need autonomy to develop decision-making skills.
Over-scheduling can lead to stress and burnout in children.
Self-chosen activities build intrinsic motivation.
Free play offers significant developmental benefits.

vocabulary.meaning: sự hướng dẫn của cha mẹ
vocabulary.example: Parental guidance helps children avoid harmful activities.

academicPhrases: There are valid arguments on both sides of this debate...
Those who advocate for parental organization argue that...
Conversely, proponents of children's free choice contend that...
Striking a balance between structure and freedom is essential...
Children's autonomy should be respected while ensuring...
A middle-ground approach would involve...

sampleAnswer.introduction: The question of how children should spend their free time has long been debated among parents and educators. While some believe parents should organize these activities, others argue for children's freedom of choice. This essay will examine both perspectives before presenting my own view.
sampleAnswer.body1: Those who support parental organization of free-time activities present compelling arguments. Parents possess the wisdom and experience to select activities that benefit their children's development, such as music lessons, sports, or educational programs. Without guidance, children might waste time on unproductive pursuits like excessive video gaming. Furthermore, structured activities teach children discipline, time management, and various skills that will serve them throughout life. Parents can also ensure their children's safety by choosing appropriate, supervised activities.
sampleAnswer.body2: On the other hand, advocates for children's free choice emphasize the importance of autonomy in child development. When children select their own activities, they develop decision-making skills and learn from their choices. Self-directed play fosters creativity, imagination, and problem-solving abilities that structured activities may not provide. Moreover, pursuing personal interests builds intrinsic motivation and genuine passion, whereas forced activities can breed resentment. Research also suggests that over-scheduled children experience higher stress levels and may suffer burnout.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In my opinion, a balanced approach works best. Parents should provide guidance and expose children to various options while ultimately respecting their children's preferences and allowing some unstructured time. This combination ensures both developmental benefits and the nurturing of independence.

topics.question: Some people think that the main benefit of international cooperation is in the protection of the environment, while others believe that businesses mainly benefit. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion.

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài yêu cầu thảo luận HAI quan điểm về lợi ích chính của hợp tác quốc tế: (1) Bảo vệ môi trường được lợi nhiều nhất, (2) Doanh nghiệp được lợi nhiều nhất. Đây là dạng Discuss Both Views. Bạn cần phân tích cả hai quan điểm và đưa ra ý kiến cá nhân. Từ khóa: 'international cooperation' (hợp tác quốc tế - có thể là hiệp định, tổ chức quốc tế...), 'main benefit' (lợi ích CHÍNH - không phải lợi ích duy nhất).
keyPoints: Giải thích cách hợp tác quốc tế giúp môi trường
Giải thích cách doanh nghiệp hưởng lợi
Đưa ví dụ cụ thể (Paris Agreement, WTO...)
Có thể kết luận cả hai đều hưởng lợi

vocabulary.example: Climate agreements like the Paris Accord require international cooperation.
Trade agreements reduce barriers for businesses.
Cross-border collaboration addresses global environmental challenges.
Multinational corporations benefit from international trade deals.
International cooperation enables efficient global supply chains.
Harmonized environmental regulations prevent pollution havens.
International cooperation promotes sustainable development goals.
Economic integration opens new markets for businesses.

academicPhrases: International cooperation serves multiple purposes, including...
Environmental challenges are inherently transnational, requiring...
From an economic perspective, international cooperation facilitates...
The benefits of global collaboration extend to both...
While environmental protection is crucial, business interests also...
A balanced view would recognize that...

sampleAnswer.introduction: International cooperation has become increasingly vital in our interconnected world. While some argue that environmental protection is the primary beneficiary of such collaboration, others contend that businesses gain the most. This essay will analyze both viewpoints before offering my perspective.
sampleAnswer.body1: Those who emphasize environmental benefits make a strong case. Environmental challenges such as climate change, ocean pollution, and biodiversity loss are inherently global problems that no single nation can solve alone. International agreements like the Paris Climate Accord and the Montreal Protocol demonstrate how cooperation can achieve significant environmental outcomes. Through shared research, technology transfer, and coordinated policies, countries can more effectively combat pollution and protect ecosystems. Without international cooperation, nations might prioritize short-term economic gains over environmental sustainability.
sampleAnswer.body2: Conversely, others argue that businesses are the main beneficiaries of international cooperation. Trade agreements and economic partnerships reduce tariffs, eliminate barriers, and create larger markets for companies to access. Multinational corporations particularly benefit from harmonized regulations and intellectual property protections. Global supply chains, which rely on international cooperation, allow businesses to optimize production costs and increase profitability. Organizations like the WTO primarily focus on facilitating commerce, suggesting that economic interests often drive international collaboration.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In my view, both the environment and businesses benefit significantly from international cooperation, and these benefits are often interconnected. Environmental agreements create new green industries, while prosperous businesses can invest more in sustainable practices. Therefore, cooperation serves multiple stakeholders rather than primarily benefiting just one.

topics.question: Some people think that it is important for a country to produce its own films and TV programs. Others think it is better to import foreign films and TV programs. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài yêu cầu thảo luận HAI quan điểm: (1) Quốc gia nên tự sản xuất phim và chương trình TV, (2) Nên nhập khẩu phim nước ngoài. Đây là dạng Discuss Both Views. Từ khóa: 'produce its own' (tự sản xuất), 'import' (nhập khẩu). Lưu ý: đề không hỏi cấm phim nước ngoài, mà hỏi cái nào quan trọng/tốt hơn.
keyPoints: Lợi ích của việc sản xuất phim trong nước (văn hóa, kinh tế)
Lợi ích của phim nước ngoài (chất lượng, đa dạng)
Có thể đề xuất sự cân bằng
Đề cập đến bảo tồn văn hóa và toàn cầu hóa

vocabulary.example: Local films help preserve cultural identity.

vocabulary.meaning: ngành công nghiệp phim trong nước
vocabulary.example: Supporting the domestic film industry creates jobs.

vocabulary.meaning: chủ nghĩa đế quốc văn hóa
vocabulary.example: Excessive foreign content may lead to cultural imperialism.
Hollywood films often have higher production values.
Local productions nurture local talent.

academicPhrases: The preservation of cultural identity is closely linked to...
While foreign productions offer entertainment value, they may...
Local content plays a crucial role in...

A balanced approach would involve supporting local production while...
Cultural diversity in media consumption enriches...

sampleAnswer.introduction: The debate over whether countries should prioritize local or foreign film and television production touches on cultural, economic, and entertainment considerations. While both approaches have merits, I believe a balanced combination serves audiences best.
sampleAnswer.body1: Proponents of local production present compelling cultural and economic arguments. Films and TV programs reflect and preserve a nation's cultural identity, traditions, and values, helping younger generations connect with their heritage. Local content addresses issues relevant to domestic audiences and tells stories that resonate with their experiences. Furthermore, a thriving domestic entertainment industry creates employment for actors, directors, writers, and technical staff, contributing to economic growth. Countries like South Korea have demonstrated how investing in local content can create global cultural phenomena like K-dramas and K-pop.
sampleAnswer.body2: However, others argue that importing foreign content has significant benefits. Major foreign productions, particularly from Hollywood, often feature higher production values, cutting-edge special effects, and internationally acclaimed talent. Access to diverse foreign content exposes audiences to different cultures, perspectives, and storytelling traditions, broadening their worldview. Additionally, smaller countries may lack the resources to produce sufficient high-quality content to meet audience demand. Restricting foreign content could limit consumer choice and potentially lead to lower quality domestic productions due to reduced competition.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In my opinion, countries should support their local entertainment industries through funding and policies while remaining open to foreign content. This balanced approach preserves cultural identity while offering audiences diverse, quality entertainment options.

topics.question: More government money should be spent on free-time activities for young people. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài yêu cầu đưa ra quan điểm về việc chính phủ có nên chi nhiều tiền hơn cho các hoạt động giải trí của thanh niên hay không. Đây là dạng Agree/Disagree. Từ khóa: 'more government money' (thêm ngân sách nhà nước), 'free-time activities' (hoạt động ngoài giờ học/làm), 'young people' (thanh niên - không chỉ trẻ em). Cần cân nhắc: lợi ích xã hội, chi phí cơ hội, các ưu tiên khác của chính phủ.
keyPoints: Lợi ích của việc đầu tư vào hoạt động cho thanh niên
Các vấn đề xã hội có thể giải quyết (tội phạm, ma túy...)
Cân nhắc với các ưu tiên ngân sách khác
Đưa ví dụ về các chương trình thành công

vocabulary.example: Youth programs provide constructive outlets for young people.

vocabulary.meaning: cơ sở vui chơi giải trí
vocabulary.example: Recreational facilities keep young people engaged positively.
Investing in youth activities can reduce juvenile delinquency.
Community centers offer safe spaces for young people.
Budget allocation should reflect societal priorities.
Youth activities promote social cohesion.
Youth programs serve as preventive measures against crime.
Public investment in youth yields long-term benefits.

academicPhrases: Government investment in youth activities represents a proactive approach to...
The long-term benefits of funding youth programs far outweigh...
Allocating resources to young people's recreation addresses...
While some argue that other priorities deserve funding, investing in youth...
Prevention is more cost-effective than dealing with...
A society's investment in its youth reflects its commitment to...

sampleAnswer.introduction: The allocation of government funds is always a matter of competing priorities. I strongly agree that increased spending on free-time activities for young people is a wise investment that yields significant social and economic returns.
sampleAnswer.body1: Investing in youth recreational activities offers substantial benefits to society. First, well-funded programs provide young people with constructive alternatives to potentially harmful behaviors. Studies consistently show that communities with accessible sports facilities, arts programs, and youth centers experience lower rates of juvenile delinquency and substance abuse. Second, such activities promote physical and mental health, reducing long-term healthcare costs. Third, team sports and group activities help young people develop essential social skills, discipline, and teamwork abilities that benefit them throughout their lives.
sampleAnswer.body2: Furthermore, the cost of not investing in youth activities often exceeds the investment itself. When young people lack positive outlets, they may turn to crime, drugs, or other antisocial behaviors that burden the justice system and social services. The expenses associated with policing, courts, and incarceration far surpass what prevention programs would cost. Additionally, engaged youth are more likely to become productive citizens who contribute to the economy. Some might argue that funds should go to healthcare or infrastructure, but investing in youth ultimately reduces demands on these services while building human capital.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In conclusion, I firmly believe that governments should allocate more resources to free-time activities for young people. This investment represents a preventive approach that benefits individuals and society while proving cost-effective in the long run.

topics.question: To improve children's lives, mothers and fathers should attend parenting and child development courses every year. To what extent do you agree or disagree?

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài đề xuất rằng để cải thiện cuộc sống trẻ em, cha mẹ NÊN tham gia các khóa học về nuôi dạy con HÀNG NĂM. Đây là dạng Agree/Disagree. Từ khóa quan trọng: 'should' (nên - có phải bắt buộc?), 'every year' (hàng năm - có cần thiết không?), 'parenting and child development courses' (khóa học về cách làm cha mẹ). Cần cân nhắc: tính khả thi, sự cần thiết, và hiệu quả của việc này.
keyPoints: Lợi ích của việc học về nuôi dạy con
Tính thực tế của việc tham gia hàng năm
Có nên bắt buộc hay khuyến khích
Các yếu tố khác ảnh hưởng đến việc nuôi con

vocabulary.example: Parenting skills can be learned and improved.
Understanding child psychology helps parents respond appropriately.
Children go through different developmental stages.

vocabulary.meaning: phương pháp dựa trên bằng chứng
vocabulary.example: Parenting courses teach evidence-based practices.
Making courses a mandatory requirement raises concerns.
Courses teach positive discipline techniques.
Informed parents create a nurturing environment.
Understanding childhood development improves parenting.

academicPhrases: While the intention behind mandatory parenting courses is commendable...
Parenting education can equip parents with valuable knowledge about...
The proposal raises questions about practicality and personal autonomy...
Evidence suggests that informed parents are better able to...
Rather than mandating annual courses, a more effective approach might...
The key to effective parenting lies not only in formal education but also in...

sampleAnswer.introduction: The suggestion that parents should attend annual parenting courses to benefit children's lives has merit in principle. However, I partially agree with this proposal, believing that while parenting education is valuable, mandatory yearly attendance may be neither practical nor necessary.
sampleAnswer.body1: Parenting courses undoubtedly offer significant benefits. Such programs educate parents about child psychology, developmental stages, and evidence-based parenting techniques. Understanding why children behave certain ways at different ages helps parents respond with patience and appropriate strategies. Courses can also address critical topics like nutrition, safety, positive discipline, and recognizing signs of learning difficulties. First-time parents particularly benefit from structured guidance, and refresher courses can introduce new research findings on child development.
sampleAnswer.body2: Nevertheless, requiring annual attendance presents practical and philosophical challenges. Many working parents already struggle to balance career and family responsibilities, making regular course attendance burdensome. Additionally, experienced parents may find repetitive courses unnecessary, as their practical experience often surpasses theoretical knowledge. There are also concerns about government overreach into family life. Furthermore, quality parenting depends on many factors beyond formal education, including emotional availability, financial stability, and cultural values that courses cannot address.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In conclusion, while I support making parenting courses available and encouraging attendance, particularly for new parents, I disagree with making them mandatory every year. A more flexible approach offering accessible resources and optional programs would better serve families.

topics.question: Many people prefer to watch foreign films rather than locally produced films. Why could this be? Should governments give more financial support to local film industries?

The disparity in production quality stems from...
Government support for local cinema is justified because...
Financial assistance would enable local filmmakers to...
Investing in the film industry yields both cultural and economic returns...

sampleAnswer.introduction: The global dominance of foreign films, particularly from Hollywood, reflects several factors that local productions often struggle to match. I believe governments should indeed provide greater financial support to their domestic film industries.
sampleAnswer.body1: Several reasons explain the preference for foreign films. First, major foreign productions typically have substantially larger budgets, enabling superior special effects, elaborate sets, and high production values that captivate audiences. Second, international films feature globally recognized stars whose fame attracts viewers regardless of the film's origin. Third, extensive marketing campaigns ensure foreign films achieve widespread visibility and cultural buzz. Additionally, decades of dominance have established certain foreign film industries as synonymous with quality entertainment, creating ingrained viewing habits among audiences worldwide.
sampleAnswer.body2: Governments should increase financial support for local film industries for multiple reasons. Cultural preservation is paramount: local films tell domestic stories, reflect national values, and preserve linguistic heritage that might otherwise be overshadowed by foreign content. Economically, a thriving film industry creates jobs for writers, actors, directors, and technical crew while potentially generating export revenue. Countries like South Korea demonstrate how government support can transform a local industry into a global cultural force. Furthermore, without support, talented local filmmakers may migrate abroad, causing brain drain in the creative sector.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In conclusion, foreign films appeal to audiences through superior resources and established reputation. However, governments should actively support local industries to preserve cultural identity and develop domestic creative talent that can eventually compete globally.

topics.question: Many believe that it is important to protect all wild animals, while others think that it is important to protect some, not all of them. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

taskAnalysis.vietnamese: Đề bài yêu cầu thảo luận HAI quan điểm: (1) Nên bảo vệ TẤT CẢ động vật hoang dã, (2) Chỉ nên bảo vệ MỘT SỐ loài. Đây là dạng Discuss Both Views. Cần phân tích lý do của cả hai quan điểm và đưa ra ý kiến cá nhân. Từ khóa: 'all wild animals' vs 'some', 'protect' (bảo vệ - khỏi tuyệt chủng, săn bắn, mất môi trường sống...).
keyPoints: Lý do bảo vệ tất cả các loài

sampleAnswer.introduction: Wildlife conservation raises important questions about resource allocation and priorities. While some advocate for protecting all wild animals equally, others believe resources should focus on selected species. This essay will examine both perspectives before presenting my view.
sampleAnswer.body1: Those who support protecting all wild animals emphasize the interconnected nature of ecosystems. Every species, regardless of size or charisma, plays a role in maintaining ecological balance. Removing one species can trigger cascading effects throughout the food web. Additionally, many species possess undiscovered potential benefits for medicine, agriculture, or science. There is also an ethical argument that humans, as the dominant species causing environmental destruction, have a moral obligation to protect all creatures from extinction caused by our activities.
sampleAnswer.body2: Conversely, those favoring selective protection present practical arguments. Conservation resources are finite, and spreading them across all species may result in ineffective protection for any. Prioritizing endangered or keystone species that have disproportionate ecological importance may yield better overall outcomes. Some species, like invasive ones, may actually harm ecosystems and should not be protected. Furthermore, species with direct benefits to humans, such as pollinators essential for agriculture, arguably deserve prioritized attention to ensure food security.
sampleAnswer.conclusion: In my opinion, while all wildlife deserves consideration, practical realities require strategic prioritization. Resources should focus primarily on endangered species and those critical to ecosystem function, while maintaining baseline protections for all wildlife through habitat preservation and anti-poaching measures.
